Instruction: 'Wash the kale leaves and remove the tough stems.'
'Tear the kale leaves into bite-sized pieces.'
In a large bowl, toss the torn kale leaves with olive oil until evenly coated.'
'Spread the kale leaves in a single layer on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.'
Bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until the edges are crispy but not burnt.'
'Remove from the oven and let cool slightly before serving.'
